price: (Al Khidiri) aramusubiza ati “Sinakubwiye ko utazashobora kunyihanganira!”
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
